long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Handy tool for the people who use Escra. Instead of opening the debugging tools to get the link of the document, they will just click the download button and it opens a new tab. In the new tab, they will just press cmd + p for mac, ctrl + p for windows in order to download the said document.
